removeAccountDetails: Resetting will remove your account from this device. Your funds will remain in the account, but will only be accessible with your Recovery Phrase
shareAnalytics_detail: We collect anonymized data about how you use {{appName}} to help improve the application for everyone.
dataSaverDetail: Data Saver mode allows you to communicate with the Celo Network through a trusted node. You can always change this mode in app settings.

restartModalSwitchOff.header: Restart To Switch Off Data Saver
restartModalSwitchOff.body: To switch Data Saver on and off repeatedly, you will need to restart the app and return to this screen.

promptFornoModal.body: We’ve noticed you’re having some trouble connecting. We recommend enabling Data Saver mode to allow you to keep using {{appName}} with intermittent connection.

accountKeyModal.header: Without your Recovery Phrase you will lose access to your funds forever
accountKeyModal.body1: In order to reset {{appName}}, you will need to confirm you've written your Recovery Phrase.
accountKeyModal.body2: Nobody, not even {{appName}}, can recover your account without your Phrase.

promptConfirmRemovalModal.header: Are you sure you want to reset {{appName}}?
promptConfirmRemovalModal.body: You will no longer be able to access your funds or your Recovery Phrase from this device. There is no way to recover your Recovery Phrase if you haven't written it down.

promptConfirmRevokeModal.header: Are you sure you want to disconnect your phone number?
promptConfirmRevokeModal.body: Once disconnected, you will not be able to reconnect your phone number to this wallet again.

name: Name
contactText: Can’t find what you’re looking for?
supportLegalCheckbox: By submitting, I agree to share the above information and any attached application log data with {{appName}} Support.
contactSuccess: Your issue has been successfully reported! Expect an email response soon!
namePictureSaved: Your name and picture were saved successfully.
verifyNumberToRaiseLimit: You can increase your send limit by verifying your identity. Please connect your phone number before continuing.
verifyIdentityToRaiseLimit: You can increase your send limit by verifying your identity.  Please be ready to provide some details in the following process.
applicationInReviewDescription: Your application is being reviewed. You will be notified when this process is completed.
applicationIncompleteDescription: The information you provided was insufficient. Please be ready to provide additional details in the following process.
applicationDeniedDescription: Your application was denied. If you feel this was a mistake, please restart the process below.
applicationCompletedDescription: Your application was accepted. You are now able to send an unlimited amount daily.
raiseLimitEmailSubject: Request to raise account send limit
raiseLimitEmailBody: I would like to request an increase to the {{dailyLimit}} {{appName}} daily limit for address {{address}}
raiseLimitEmailSuccess: Your request has been sent successfully! Expect an email response soon!
raiseLimitEmailNotSent: Your request was not sent. Please try again.
storeRecoveryTitle: We need you to setup your account again
storeRecoveryBody: There’s been an error. We’re aware of the issue and working to fix it. In the meantime, you will need to go through the setup process again.
shakeForSupport: This menu appears when you shake your device.
introBody:
Your Recovery Phrase is the most important part of your account.

Please find a private place to set up your Phrase. It takes about five minutes.
backupSetupBody: To protect your funds, you're required to set up your Recovery Phrase before you can continue using {{appName}}.
postSetupBody: If you lose your Recovery Phrase, you will lose access to all of your Celo Dollars and CELO. Nobody, not even {{appName}}, will be able to help you recover your account without your Recovery Phrase. Store it in a safe place and do not share it.
failedFetchMnemonic: Failed to fetch your Recovery Phrase
backupKeyNotification: Keep your funds safe. Set up your Recovery Phrase now.
backupKeySummary: Find a private place and write down your Recovery Phrase. Please store it somewhere safe. Do not save it in your phone.
savedConfirmation: Yes, I have written down my Phrase.
backupQuizWordCount: What's the <0>{{ordinal}}</0> word of your Recovery Phrase?
backupQuizFailed: The Recovery Phrase you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
invalidWordsInBackupPhrase: Some words in the Recovery Phrase are not valid: {{ invalidWords }}

backupComplete.1: Next, you can set up Safeguards.

cancelDialog.title: Finish setting up your Recovery Phrase
cancelDialog.body:
Your Recovery Phrase is extremely important. Without a Phrase, you can lose access to your wallet forever.
You will be blocked from sending any transactions until you finish setting up your Recovery Phrase.

backupPhrasePlaceholder: horse leopard dog monkey shark tiger lemur whale squid wolf squirrel mouse lion elephant cat shrimp bear penguin deer turtle fox zebra goat giraffe

guide.title: Your Recovery Phrase is a special kind of password
guide.text: Your Recovery Phrase is the one and only way to access your account.

guide.title: Without your Recovery Phrase, you can lose access forever
guide.text: If you lose your phone, you must have your Recovery Phrase to get your account back. Nobody, not even {{appName}}, will be able to recover your funds without it.

guide.title: Write it down
guide.text: Write down your Recovery Phrase and store it in a safe place. Do not save it in your phone.

guide.title: Keep your Phrase private
guide.text: Anyone with your Phrase will have access to your account and all of its funds. Don’t share it with others.

consumerIncentivesSummary: Supercharge is here! Get {{percent}}% annual rewards on your highest stablecoin balance (cUSD, cEUR, or cREAL). Available for a limited time. Here's how it works:

earnWeekly.text: Tap Connect Number if you haven't connected it yet.

noMinCommitment.earningText: Receive rewards on 10-1000 cUSD, 10-1000 cEUR, or 50-6000 cREAL.
noMinCommitment.connectText: Just have a balance of at least {{minBalance}} {{currency}} and connect your phone number to start getting rewarded.

saveMoreEarnMore.text: This will ensure your rewards are safe and in your control.

conclusion: It’s that simple. Supercharge your crypto today!
superchargeDescription: Get {{apy}}% annual rewards on your {{token}} balance. Here's how to start:
superchargeDisclaimer: Max-out rewards by adding up to {{amount}} {{token}}
superchargeDisclaimerMaxRewards: You’re getting maximum rewards on your {{token}}
superchargeDisclaimerDayLimit: Your rewards must be claimed within 28 days. <0>Learn more</0>

superchargeTokenDetailsDialog.title: Which assets can I Supercharge?
superchargeTokenDetailsDialog.body: You’ll get rewarded weekly on your Celo stablecoin with the highest value (cEUR, cUSD, cREAL).

superchargingDescription: You’re getting {{apy}}% annually. Every week you'll get a notification when your rewards are ready, come back here to claim them.
superchargeClaimText: Claim your rewards to add them to your balance.
superchargeFetchRewardsFailed: Error while fetching pending Supercharge rewards. Please try again later.
superchargeClaimSuccess: Your Supercharge rewards have been added to your Total Balance.
superchargeClaimFailure: There was an issue claiming your Supercharge rewards.
superchargeNotificationBody: Your Supercharge rewards are here! Claim them now.
startSuperchargingNotificationBody: Get rewarded with crypto weekly. Start Supercharging!

whatIsGold: {{appName}} allows you to buy and sell CELO
notEnoughDollars: Not enough Celo Dollars to make exchange
notEnoughGold: Not enough CELO to make exchange
exchangeRateChange: Exchange rate has changed, please retry
feeExchangeEducation:
When exchanging between assets, a small fee goes towards keeping the value of Celo stablecoins tied to the asset they track. 

Visit the FAQ to learn more.
rateInfoBody: Your amount could change depending on market conditions. Your final amount will be no more than 1% different from the estimate shown.
noExchanges: There are no exchanges available for {{digitalAsset}} in your region.
cashOutSubtitle: Spend on gift cards and other purchases or send funds to a crypto exchange
spendSubtitle: Use your balance with supporting merchants
tapToCopyCeloDollarsAddress: Tap to copy your {{appName}} CUSD address
dollarsNotYetEnabledNote: Celo Dollars are not yet available on any providers. To get Celo Dollars, purchase CELO and exchange it for Celo Dollars in the CELO tab.
receiveWithBidali: Gift Cards and Mobile Top Up

fundingEducationDialog.title: Funding your {{appName}}
fundingEducationDialog.body:
{{appName}} is powered by the Celo Network. {{appName}} runs on Celo Dollars (cUSD), a stable digital currency tracking the US Dollar.

To fund your {{appName}} wallet, purchase cUSD from one of the 3rd party providers available in your location. For more information please visit <0>{{link}}</0>

cashOutEducationDialog.title: Withdraw from {{appName}}
cashOutEducationDialog.body:
{{appName}} is powered by the Celo Network. {{appName}} runs on Celo Dollars (cUSD), a stable digital currency tracking the US Dollar.

To withdraw your {{appName}} balance, sell cUSD with one of the 3rd party providers available in your location. For more information please visit <0>{{link}}</0>

explanationModal.title: About Providers
explanationModal.body: Providers allow you to add or withdraw funds from your account. They determine their own rates and restrictions depending on various factors. Please visit the provider’s website for specific help.

invalidAmountDialog.minAmount: Our providers do not support totals smaller than {{usdLimit}}{{localLimit}}. Please enter a larger amount.
invalidAmountDialog.maxAmount: Our providers do not support totals larger than {{usdLimit}}{{localLimit}}. Please enter a smaller amount.

dailyLimitDialog.body: You are about to purchase more than your daily send limit of {{limit}}. Please contact <0>{{contactEmail}}</0> if you want to raise your daily send limit.

providerFeesDialog.title: Provider Fees
providerFeesDialog.body1: Provider fees are set by each provider individually and include an exchange fee and liquidity fee, among others. To learn more please visit

providerFeeDiscountDialog.title: Fee Discount
providerFeeDiscountDialog.body: As a promotion, fees are temporarily subsidized to celebrate the launch of {{appName}}!

dailyLimitRequest: Hi! I'd like to increase my daily send limit please.
pleaseSelectProvider: Please select a provider below. These links connect to a third party service.
otherFundingOptions: For more ways to add and withdraw funds, visit <0>How to fund your account</0>

youCanTransferOut: You can withdraw your funds by sending them to a third party exchange that supports {{digitalAsset}}.

appDescription: A mobile payments wallet that works worldwide

goldEducationSteps.title: What is CELO?
goldEducationSteps.text: CELO is a digital currency that keeps the Celo Dollar (cUSD) stable.

goldEducationSteps.title: CELO’s price changes
goldEducationSteps.text: If more people use the Celo Dollar, the value of CELO increases. Unlike CELO, the Celo Dollar doesn't change in value.

goldEducationSteps.title: Shape the Celo Network
goldEducationSteps.text: By holding CELO, you have the ability to vote for changes and features you’d like to see on the Celo Network.

goldEducationSteps.title: Please buy and sell responsibly
goldEducationSteps.text: {{appName}} allows you to buy and sell CELO. CELO presents a risk of financial loss, please exercise caution.

whySendFees: This fee covers costs for the new user to connect their phone number
whyReceiveFees: You were sent some crypto to confirm your account
accountSetupFailedDescription: Please delete {{appName}} from your device and try again. If you continue to have issues please reach out to support.
inviteAnyone: Send easily to your friends by adding your contacts

inviteDialog.title: Invite a Friend
inviteDialog.body: Connect and share value with your friends and family on {{appName}}.

inviteAndSendDialog.title: Finish inviting {{name}} to {{appName}}
inviteAndSendDialog.bodyWithRewards: Once they join & connect a phone number, you both receive {{amount}} {{currency}}. Click below to send and customize your invite.
inviteAndSendDialog.body: Share an invitation message with {{name}} to join {{appName}}. Once they join & connect a phone number, they'll receive your payment.

inviteRewardsBanner.title: Send crypto to invite a friend (beta)
inviteRewardsBanner.body: Once they set up their {{appName}} wallet, you each get {{amount}} {{currency}} in rewards. Earn up to <0>{{maxAmount}} {{currency}}</0>!

joinText: {{appName}} helps you to send, receive, and save value on the Celo Network.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.info: In order to use our services, please read and accept our <0>User Agreement and Terms</0> by clicking the accept button below.
terms.privacy: By joining this network, you give us permission to collect anonymous information about your use of the app. Additionally, if you connect your phone number, a hashed copy of it will be stored on the Celo Network. If you grant {{appName}} access to your contact list, {{appName}} will import each contact's name, phone number and profile picture to allow users to connect through the {{appName}} app. To learn how we collect and use this information please review our <0>Privacy Policy</0>.
terms.goldDisclaimer: When you create an "account" with {{appName}} you are creating a digital wallet to which only you hold the keys. No other person or entity, including cLabs or {{appName}}, can recover your key, change or undo transactions, or recover lost funds. Be aware that CELO, cUSD and cEUR are part of a new asset class and present a risk of financial loss. Carefully consider your financial circumstance and tolerance for financial risk before purchasing any asset. You can only send up to {{dailyLimitCUSD}} cUSD per day through {{appName}} (the "Daily Limit"). You must contact support@{{appName}}app.com and provide additional, personal information to request increasing this Daily Limit. There could be a delay to conduct required compliance.

pinLostForeverMessage: You removed the screen lock, the PIN is lost

importContactsPermission.title: Import Contacts
importContactsPermission.0: Connecting your address book makes it easy to send and request payments with your friends. Otherwise, you’ll have to enter their info individually.
importContactsPermission.1: Don’t worry—connecting does not send invites to your contacts.

notReadyForCode: Not yet ready for code entry
cantVerifyRevokedAccount: This account has been previously revoked. Please create a new account and try again.

education.body1: Next, please connect your phone number.
education.body2: Connecting your phone makes it easier to send and receive with friends. You can also skip this step and return to it later.

verificationLoading.pleaseKeepAppOpen: Please don't leave this screen or you'll have to restart
verificationLoading.card1: To make sure your phone number is really yours, we're sending you three messages.
verificationLoading.card2: Once your number is connected, you can send and receive funds easily to your phone number.
verificationLoading.card3: Connecting your number also allows you to see which of your friends are on {{appName}}.
verificationLoading.card4: We require three SMS messages to securely connect your phone number.

skipModal.body1: Connecting your number gives you more ways to send payments and allows you to collect Supercharge rewards.

failModal.body1: An issue has occurred while connecting your phone number.
failModal.body2: You can skip connecting for now and try again later.
failModal.body1InsufficientBalance: Your current balance is not high enough to complete the connection process.
failModal.body2InsufficientBalance: Please try again when you have added funds to your wallet.
failModal.body1SaltQuotaExceeded: Your phone number lookup quota is used up
failModal.body2SaltQuotaExceeded: Please try again when you have purchased more lookups
failModal.enterCodesBody: If you already received three codes via SMS, you can still enter them.

retryWithFornoModal.body1: An issue has occurred while connecting your phone number. We recommend trying again with Data Saver mode enabled.
retryWithFornoModal.body2: Data Saver mode allows you to communicate with the Celo Network more consistently using a trusted connection.

congratsVerified: Congratulations, your phone number is now connected!

notification.body: Receive payments directly to your phone number

quotaLookup.title: Lookup quota exceeded
quotaLookup.body1: To keep your phone number safe and private, {{appName}} limits how many phone numbers users can lookup.
quotaLookup.body2: You can purchase more lookups for a small fee.

onboardingEducation.step1: Make fast and reliable digital payments with Kolektivo Guilder.
onboardingEducation.step2: Easily purchase goods and services from local organizations.
onboardingEducation.step3: Participate in a local impact network and help develop Curaçao.
onboardingEducation.step4: Join the revolution by creating your {{appName}}.

enableBiometry.title: Secure your wallet
enableBiometry.description: {{biometryType}} secures your wallet and makes it easier to use {{appName}}

welcome.title: Step into the future of crypto with {{appName}}

disclosure.title: Import Contacts
disclosure.body: {{appName}} would like to import your contacts. By tapping below, I allow access to my contacts' phone numbers, names and photos for purposes of connecting with them through {{appName}}

pincodeSet.verify: Enter your PIN again to confirm

inviteCode.title: Invite Code
inviteCode.body: Did you receive a payment or invite? If so, please copy and paste the Invite Code below.
inviteCode.label: Invite Code
inviteCode.nodeCodeInviteLink: Don’t have an invite code? Request one at <0>celo.org/developers/wallet</0> or <1>continue without</1>
inviteCode.loadingBody: This can take up to 90 seconds

verificationEducation.title: Phone Number
verificationEducation.body:
To make sure your number is really yours, you’ll receive three SMS messages that will cost about 0.05 cUSD each.

Connection takes about three minutes.
verificationEducation.feelessBody: You will receive three messages to help securely connect your phone number. Connection takes about three minutes.
verificationEducation.bodyInsufficientBalance:
Your current balance is not high enough to complete the confirmation process.

Please try again when you have added funds to your wallet.

verificationSkipDialog.title: Are you sure?
verificationSkipDialog.body:
Connecting allows you to send and receive funds to any phone number.

Accounts that are not connected can only send payments using Celo addresses or QR codes.

verificationPrematureRevealMessage: Please wait one minute before resending

verificationLearnMoreDialog.title: Phone Numbers and {{appName}}
verificationLearnMoreDialog.body:
Connecting allows you to send and receive funds with your phone number.

<0>Can I do this later?</0>

Yes, but wallets that aren’t connected can only send payments with QR codes or Account Addresses.

<1>Secure and Private</1>

{{appName}} uses state of the art cryptography to keep your phone number private.

importExistingKey.explanation: Your Recovery Phrase is a 24-word phrase that you wrote down and saved when you set up your account. Please enter it here to import your account.

verificationInput.title: Confirm
verificationInput.body: We sent you three messages (SMS). Please copy and paste them below.
verificationInput.body_ios: We sent you three messages (SMS). Please tap the link in each message to fill the codes below or copy and paste them manually.
verificationInput.body_short: We sent three codes to {{phoneNumber}}, please enter them below.
verificationInput.codePlaceholder1_ios: Tap or copy the first message
verificationInput.codePlaceholder2_ios: Tap or copy the second message
verificationInput.codePlaceholder3_ios: Tap or copy the third message

bodySection1.title: Received all three messages?
bodySection1.content:
If your messages contain a link, simply tap the links to confirm.

If there are no links, please copy and paste the messages into the fields. You’re welcome to paste the entire message.

bodySection2.title: Missing some or all messages?
bodySection2.defaultContent: If you’re having trouble receiving messages, you can skip this step for now and try again later. Sometimes it can take a few minutes for messages to arrive.
bodySection2.content_countdown: $t(verificationInputHelpDialog.bodySection2.defaultContent) The skip option below will be available in {{count}} second.
bodySection2.content_countdown_plural: $t(verificationInputHelpDialog.bodySection2.defaultContent) The skip option below will be available in {{count}} seconds.

emptyAccount.description: This account doesn’t have any funds. Would you still like to use it?
emptyAccount.title: Balance <0></0>

verificationUnavailable:
Phone number connection is currently unavailable. Please enter your phone number and we will notify you when it is possible to connect again.

In the meantime, you can continue to use {{appName}} with QR codes or Account Addresses. Don't worry, payments sent to your phone number will be waiting for you until you connect it to your account.
requestUnavailableNoDisplayNameHeader: Your contact’s phone number is not connected to an Account Address.
requestUnavailableBody: The number {{e164PhoneNumber}} doesn't have an account or hasn't connected it yet. Requests can only be sent to connected numbers.
requestUnavailableNoNumberBody: Your contact doesn't have an account or hasn't connected it yet. Requests can only be sent to connected numbers.
verificationMessage: You paid a fee to connect your account. Welcome to {{appName}}!
receivedAmountFromCelo: You received this amount from the Faucet!
feeEducation: The Celo Blockchain collects a transaction fee to keep the network supported and running smoothly.
inviteMoneyEscrow: Send this contact an invite message and they’ll receive the funds once they connect their number.
keepMoneySafe: We'll keep these funds safe until your friend creates a {{appName}} account
searchFriends: Try entering a phone number if you are unable to find who you're looking for
searchForSomeone: Search for someone using their name, phone number, or address
inviteWithoutPayment: Hi! I’ve been using {{appName}} to send crypto worldwide. It’s easy to try and I want to invite you to check it out with this link: {{link}}
inviteWithEscrowedPayment: Hi! I’ve been using {{appName}} to send crypto worldwide. I just sent you {{amount}} {{token}}. Please download the {{appName}} App and redeem your {{token}} using this link: {{link}}
inviteWithRewards: Hey! I just sent you crypto with my {{appName}} wallet. Once you download the app and connect your phone number, we both get a {{amount}} {{token}} reward. Use this link: {{link}}
writeStorageNeededForQrDownload: Storage write permission is needed for downloading the QR code
cameraScanInfo: Center code in the box above
cameraNotAuthorizedDescription: Please enable the Camera in your phone’s Settings. You’ll need it to scan QR codes.

verificationCta.body: Connect your phone and sync your contacts to quickly send to your friends.

importContactsCta.body: Please enable Contacts in your phone’s Settings to find your friends by name.

secureSendExplanation.body1: {{e164PhoneNumber}} has multiple accounts associated with it. {{displayName}} could have created a new {{appName}} account, or may have lost their phone or had their account compromised.
secureSendExplanation.body1NoDisplayName: Your contact has multiple accounts associated with it. Your contact could have created a new {{appName}} account, or may have lost their phone or had their account compromised.
secureSendExplanation.body2: You must scan their QR code or confirm their Account Address before transacting.

confirmAccountNumber.title: Confirm Account Address
confirmAccountNumber.bodyPartial: Please ask {{displayName}} for the last four digits of their Account Address. It's safest to do this in person or by phone.
confirmAccountNumber.bodyPartialNoDisplayName: Please ask your contact for the last four digits of their Account Address. It's safest to do this in person or by phone.
confirmAccountNumber.body1Full: Please ask {{displayName}} for their Account Address.
confirmAccountNumber.body1FullNoDisplayName: Please ask your contact for their Account Address.
confirmAccountNumber.body2Full: We strongly recommend asking in person or over the phone, through WhatsApp or Messenger, or by email. For security, please do not use text messaging (SMS).

helpModal.body1: Account Addresses (also known as addresses) are located in the menu. From the Home screen, open the menu by tapping the icon in the top left corner.
helpModal.body2: The Account Address is near the bottom of the menu.
helpModal.body3: Account Addresses begin with "0x" and are 42 characters long

transferAddressChanged: This contact changed their Account Address since the transaction. This payment was sent to:

encryption.warningLabel: This comment will not be encrypted
encryption.warningModalBody: Encryption ensures your comments are kept private. {{appName}} uses encryption on transaction comments when both the sender and receiver have this feature set up. Set up will normally occur automatically once a user sends their first transaction.
encryption.feeModalBody: Encryption helps keep your sensitive data private. A small one-time fee is added to your first transaction to setup encryption. This ensures your comments will be sent securely and privately.

sendToAddressWarning.title: Sending to an address
sendToAddressWarning.body: Please make sure this address supports the asset you are trying to send. Your funds may not be recoverable if this address is invalid. Send a test payment first to make sure this is the correct address.

whatTotalValue.title: What does Total Balance mean?
whatTotalValue.body:
Your Total Balance is an approximate sum of all your {{appName}} assets. Your Total Balance will change as prices fluctuate. It is updated every 10 minutes.
Some assets may not be shown in the Total Balance because the price is unavailable at the time of calculation.

personaAccountEndpointFail: Identity verification is not currently available. Please try again later
plaidCreateLinkTokenFail: Unable to link bank account. Please try again later
getBankAccountsFail: Unable to retrieve your linked bank accounts. Please try again later
deleteBankAccountFail: Unable to delete your linked bank account. Please try again later

completed.title: Verification complete
completed.description: We successfully verified your identity. Please continue to finish linking your bank account.
completed.descriptionStep2NotEnabled: We successfully verified your identity. We'll let you know when you can finish linking your bank account.
completed.descriptionRegionNotSupported: We successfully verified your identity. Your region is not currently supported. We'll let you know when you can finish linking your bank account.

failed.title: Verification denied
failed.description: We were unable to verify your identity. Please try again or contact support to continue.

pending.title: Review in progress
pending.description: Your information has been received and is being reviewed.

begin.label: Step 1
begin.title: Verify your Identity
begin.description: Adding crypto with a bank account is easy. This step will take about 5 minutes.

stepTwo.label: Step 2
stepTwo.disabledDescription: Bank account support coming soon! We'll let you know when you can connect your bank account to {{appName}}.
stepTwo.title: Enter Bank Details
stepTwo.description: You're almost done! Enter bank details to link your account to {{appName}}.

error.title: Unable to link bank account.
error.description: Please try to link your bank account again, or contact support.
error.contactSupportPrefill: I was unable to link my bank account to {{appName}}

connectPhoneNumber.title: Connect phone number to continue
connectPhoneNumber.body: Your phone number needs to be connected to verify your identity and link your bank account.

outOfSyncBanner.title: You're offline.
outOfSyncBanner.message: Your balances may not be up to date.

dappsScreen.title: Dapps
dappsScreen.message: Explore ways to use your crypto
dappsScreen.errorMessage: There was an error loading dapps

dappsScreenHelpDialog.title: What are dapps?
dappsScreenHelpDialog.message:
Dapps (decentralized apps) provide new ways to use your crypto, earn rewards, and explore Web3.

Connect {{appName}} to a dapp to get started.

dappsScreenBottomSheet.title: {{dappName}} is an external application
dappsScreenBottomSheet.message:
You are about to open an application not operated by {{appName}}.

{{appName}} makes no representations about this application. Use at your own risk.

merchantMoneyEscrow: You're about to send a direct payment to a merchant.
merchantPaymentNumberVerificationMessage: You need to connect your number
merchantPaymentSetup: There was an error loading the merchant information, please try scanning the QRCode again
merchantWalletUnlockError: Something went wrong when unlocking your wallet, please try again

selectProviderScreen.somePaymentsUnavailable: Some payment methods are unavailable in your region
selectProviderScreen.whyMissingPayments: Why don't I see more payment methods?
selectProviderScreen.missingPaymentsExplained:
Not all payment methods are available in every single country.

This could be because the option does not exist in that country, or is blocked due to local regulations.

cashIn.fiatExchangeSubtitle: Fund your {{appName}} account from a bank, card or exchange.

cashOut.fiatExchangeSubtitle: Get funds out of {{appName}} and into a bank account, card, crypto exchange or to mobile money.

spend.fiatExchangeSubtitle: Spend on gift cards and other purchases.

fiatDetailsScreen.addFiatAccountSuccess: Your account has been linked to {{appName}}.
fiatDetailsScreen.addFiatAccountResourceExist: You have already linked this account to {{appName}}.
fiatDetailsScreen.addFiatAccountFailed: Your account was not linked, please try again or contact support.

accountNumber.label: Account Number
accountNumber.errorMessage: Account number should be 10 digits long and only contain numbers

NuxInterests.title: Your Interests
NuxInterests.header: What would you like to see?
NuxInterests.body: Kolektivo is a community-first organization. This means that to best serve you, we want to know what you're interested in.

InterestsLearnMoreDialog.title: My Interests and {{appName}}
InterestsLearnMoreDialog.body:
This helps Kolektivo better understand your needs and how you use the wallet.

<0>Can I do this later?</0>

Yes, but we recommend this step to help you get the most out of your wallet experience.

<1>Anonymous</1>

{{appName}} does not store this information alongside any uniquely identifying data.

exportPrompt.title: You're About to Export!
exportPrompt.details: You're about the export all transactions for the {{month}} period.
